name: FetchSmsCommand
description: Fetch SMS Command instance from your account.

Sid.description: The SID of the SMS Command resource to fetch.

$ul: **account_sid**: The SID of the [Account](https://www.twilio.com/docs/iam/api/account) that created the SMS Command resource.
**date_created**: The date and time in GMT when the resource was created specified in [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) format.
**date_updated**: The date and time in GMT when the resource was last updated specified in [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) format.
**payload**: The message body of the SMS Command sent to or from the SIM. For text mode messages, this can be up to 160 characters.
**sid**: The unique string that we created to identify the SMS Command resource.
**sim_sid**: The SID of the [SIM](https://www.twilio.com/docs/iot/supersim/api/sim-resource) that this SMS Command was sent to or from.
**url**: The absolute URL of the SMS Command resource.
